titleStmt.title: An advertisement to the jury-men of England, touching witches. Together with a difference between an English and Hebrew vvitch.
titleStmt.author: Filmer, Robert, Sir, d. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.G. for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: In part a reply to: Perkins, William. A discourse of the damned art of witchcraft.
The words "English and Hebrew" are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
